briefdescription.para: Keeps track of whether or not the graphics pipeline needs to be recreated.
Keeps track of whether or not the swapchain needs to be recreated.
Can be set to avoid pipeline recreation everytime a geometry instance is added.
The maximum amount of geometry (Must be a multiple of minimum storage buffer alignment).
The maximum amount of textures.
Where all assets like models, textures and shaders are stored.
Stores the clear color.
The maximum path depth.
The current path depth.
Stores the total amount of samples that will be taken and averaged per pixel.
Temporary for debugging.
Keeps track of whether or not the graphics pipelines should be recreated automatically as soon as possible.
Keeps track of whether or not the swapchain should be recreated automatically as soon as possible.
Used to set the path depth.

detaileddescription.para:
The function will trigger a pipeline recreation as soon as possible unless it was explicitely disabled using setAutomaticPipelineRefresh(bool). If a value higher than the device's maximum supported value is set, it will use the maximum value instead.
recursionDepth
The new value for the recursion depth.

briefdescription.para: Used to toggle Russian roulette ray termination.

detaileddescription.para:
This can be used to improve performance at a moderate increase of variance.
flag
The actual toggle.

briefdescription.para: Used to toggle next event estimation (NEE).
Used to set a minimum amount of bounces (rays) in a path before NEE will be applied.

parameterdescription.para: The total amount of bounces to skip.

briefdescription.para: Used to set a minimum amount of bounces (rays) in a path before Russian roulette termination will be applied.

parameterdescription.para: The total amount of bounces to skip.

simplesect.para: Returns the maximum path depth on the GPU for recursively tracing rays.

briefdescription.para: Used to changed the clear color.

detaileddescription.para:
The function will trigger a swapchain recreation as soon as possible unless it was explicitely disabled using setAutomaticPipelineRefresh(bool).
clearColor
The new value for the clear color.

briefdescription.para: Used to set a path to the directory containing all assets.

detaileddescription.para:
This path should contain all models, textures and shaders.
argc
The argc parameter that can be retrieved from the main-function's parameters.
argv
The argv parameter that can be retrieved from the main-function's parameters.

briefdescription.para: Used to set a path to the directory containing all assets.

detaileddescription.para:
This path should contain all models, textures and shaders.
path
The path to assets.

briefdescription.para: Used to toggle the automatic pipeline recreation.

parameterdescription.para: If false, the pipelines will not be recreated automatically until this function is called with true.

briefdescription.para: Used to set the maximum amount of geometry (3D models) that can be loaded.
Used to set the maximum amount of geometry instances (instances of 3D models) that can be loaded.
Used to set the maximum amount of textures that can be loaded.
Used to set the amount of paths sampled per pixel.
Used to toggle frame accumulation.

detaileddescription.para:
Can be used to retrieve a converged image of static scenes.
flag
The actual toggle

briefdescription.para: Used to recreate the pipeline manually.

detaileddescription.para: The pipeline recreation event will be handled within the same application tick.

briefdescription.para: Used to recreate the swapchain manually.

detaileddescription.para: The swapchain recreation event will be handled within the same application tick.

simplesect.para: Returns a total variance estimate calculated when updateVariance(flag) was called.
This feature is still experimental and does not work as intended.
Requires the RX_VARIANCE_ESTIMATOR macro to be defined.

briefdescription.para: Used to calculate the variance of the current image.

simplesect.para: This feature is still experimental and does not work as intended.
Requires the RX_VARIANCE_ESTIMATOR macro to be defined.

briefdescription.para: This function will be called by Rayex::init() in case the path was not set manually.

simplesect.para: This function might file in setting the correct path. That is why it is recommended to set it automatically using setAssetsPath(std::string).

briefdescription.para: Exposes all graphic settings supported by the renderer.

detaileddescription.para:
Any necessary pipeline recreations and swapchain recreations will not be performed at the point of calling any setter but instead the next time the renderer will be updated.
Any function that sets the maximum of a given entity needs to be called before RAYEX_NAMESPACE::Rayex::init().
